mapper.update: update mkt_strategy_conf_rule set TAR_GRP_ID = #{tarGrpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID = #{evtContactConfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RULE_CONF_ID = #{ruleConfId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_ID = #{mktStrategyConfRuleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_ID, TAR_GRP_ID, PRODUCT_ID, EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID, RULE_CONF_ID, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_strategy_conf_rule where MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_ID = #{mktStrategyConfRuleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_ID, TAR_GRP_ID, PRODUCT_ID, EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID, RULE_CONF_ID, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_strategy_conf_rule

select cr.MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_ID, cr.TAR_GRP_ID, cr.PRODUCT_ID, cr.EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID, cr.RULE_CONF_ID from mkt_strategy_conf_rule cr left join mkt_strategy_conf_rule_rel crr on cr.MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_ID = crr.MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_ID where crr.MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_ID = #{mktStrategyConfId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
